snippet: A week after it appeared that the automaker’s chairman was ready to oust him, the company said the chief executive would have his contract renewed.
abstract: Volkswagen announces that chief executive Martin Winterkorn will have his contract renewed, despite fact that it appeared that chairman Ferdinand K Piech was considering having Winterkorn replaced.
lead_paragraph: A week after it appeared that the automaker’s chairman was ready to oust him, the company said the chief executive would have his contract renewed.

headline.main: Martin Winterkorn to Stay as Volkswagen Chief, Even After Slight
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; VW Chief Gets New Pact After Slight by Chairman
